properties.name: marketplace.base-url
properties.description: Base URL to use when constructing URL's pointing to the marketplace from external services.

properties.name: marketplace.marketplace-db
properties.description: JDBC connection string for the marketplace database'

properties.name: marketplace.system-db
properties.description: JDBC connection string for the system database'

properties.name: marketplace.max-recent-solutions
properties.description: The maximum number of items to return when queried for last updated

properties.name: marketplace.max-featured-solutions
properties.description: The maximum number of items to return when queried for featured items

properties.name: marketplace.solutions-folder
properties.description: Server relative path for storing solution data

properties.name: marketplace.pages-folder
properties.description: Server relative path for storing server pages

properties.name: marketplace.footer
properties.description: A string used as the footer text on all pages

properties.name: marketplace.featured.maximum
properties.description: The maximum number of featured solutions to show

properties.name: marketplace.featured.solutions
properties.description: A comma separated list of solution identifiers
